data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Trnavský, Slovakia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trnavský, Slovakia

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Trnavský, Slovakia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 8,057 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Trnavský.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Trnavský.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Slovak-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Trnavský, Slovakia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 8,057 believers in Trnavský, Slovakia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Trnavský. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

location.name: Trnavský
location.cities_list: Trnava, Piešťany, Hodonín, Hlohovec, Dunajská Streda
